description.narrative: Expected development impact includes: (i) Linkages: Modern, high-quality warehouses support improved efficiencies and reduced operational costs for local businesses and supply chains. (ii) Standards: Other industry players will be encouraged to raise standards by increased competition. The Project is expected to serve as a catalyst for other firms to make improvements in areas such as labor conditions, safety, efficient use of resources and environmental sustainability.

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
